title: Decade Diary – Phase 1: Home Dashboard, 10-Year Vision Board, Daily Planner & Couples Collaboration

requirements.text: Create a backend data model and actor supporting two core entities: User and Couple. A Couple links two user principals together, giving both read and write access to all shared planner data (vision board entries, daily planner entries, goals).

quotes: make it available for couples to work together

acceptanceCriteria: A couple can be created by one user inviting another via their principal ID.
Both members of a couple can create, read, and update shared planner data.
Users without a couple link only see and edit their own data.
Couple state persists across canister upgrades.

requirements.text: Implement backend storage and CRUD operations for the 10-Year Vision Board. Each goal entry must support: category (Career, Financial, Health, Relationship, Personal Growth, Travel, Spiritual), target year, milestone list, 'why this matters' note, and a progress percentage (0–100).
acceptanceCriteria: Goals can be created, updated, and deleted per authenticated user or couple.
All seven categories are supported.
Progress percentage is stored as a Nat (0–100).
Milestones are stored as an ordered list of text entries.

requirements.text: Implement backend storage and CRUD operations for the Daily Planner. Each day entry must include: date, schedule timeline (list of time-block items), top 3 tasks (with completion status), notes, water intake count, mood emoji selection, gratitude entries (3 items), and a mini journal text field.
acceptanceCriteria: Daily entries are keyed by date and user/couple ID.
All fields are optional except the date key.
Existing entries can be updated; data persists across sessions.

requirements.text: Implement a backend function that returns a daily motivational quote. The quote should rotate daily (keyed by day-of-year) from a hardcoded list of at least 30 quotes.
acceptanceCriteria: A query function returns a quote string for the current day.
The same quote is returned for all calls on the same calendar day.
The quote list contains at least 30 unique motivational quotes.

requirements.text: Build a Home Dashboard page as the default landing screen. It must display: Today's Focus (top 3 tasks from today's daily plan), This Week (a mini summary of the current week's tasks), This Month (a count of goals and tasks for the current month), 10-Year Vision Progress (a summary card per category showing average progress %), a daily motivational quote banner at the top, and a Quick Journal Entry button that opens the Daily Planner mini journal for today.
acceptanceCriteria: All five dashboard sections are visible on the home screen.
The motivational quote updates each calendar day.
Clicking the Quick Journal Entry button navigates to or opens today's daily planner journal field.
10-Year Vision Progress cards show per-category average progress as a percentage bar.
Dashboard data reflects real backend state.

requirements.text: Build a 10-Year Vision Board page where users can create and manage goals across all seven categories. Each goal card must display: category, target year, milestones (editable list), 'why this matters' text, and a progress bar with an editable percentage slider. Goals should be grouped by category.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add a new goal via a form modal.
Goals are grouped visually by category.
Progress slider updates the backend value on change.
Milestones can be added and removed inline.
Deleting a goal asks for confirmation before removing.

requirements.text: Build a Daily Planner page where users can view and edit the entry for any selected date (defaulting to today). The page must include: a date picker to navigate between days, a schedule timeline (add time-block items), top 3 tasks with checkboxes, notes field, water intake counter (tap to increment), mood emoji picker, three gratitude input fields, and a mini journal textarea.
acceptanceCriteria: Selecting a date loads that day's existing entry if present.
All fields auto-save or save on a 'Save' button press.
Checked tasks are visually marked as complete.
Water intake counter shows current count and supports increment/decrement.
Mood picker shows at least 5 distinct emoji options.

requirements.text: Build a Couples Collaboration UI. It must include: a 'My Partner' section in settings where a user can invite a partner by entering their principal ID, view pending/accepted couple status, and disconnect from a partner. When a couple is active, the dashboard and all planner pages must display a shared-mode indicator and show both partners' data together.

quotes: make it available for couples to work together

acceptanceCriteria: A user can enter a partner's principal ID and send an invite.
The invited partner sees a pending invite they can accept or decline.
Once connected, a 'Couple Mode' badge is shown in the header.
All planner data shown in Couple Mode reflects both partners' entries.
A disconnect option is available in the settings.

requirements.text: Apply a clean, warm-aesthetic visual theme consistently across all pages. Use soft warm neutrals (cream, warm white, soft taupe) paired with one warm accent color (e.g., dusty rose or warm amber). Typography should feel editorial and elegant. The layout should use generous whitespace, soft card shadows, and rounded corners. The motivational quote banner should be typographically prominent.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent color palette and typography.
No harsh or jarring colors are used.
Card components use rounded corners and soft shadows.
The motivational quote is displayed in a large, elegant typographic style.
The design feels cohesive across Dashboard, Vision Board, and Daily Planner pages.

constraints: All Motoko logic must remain in a single actor in backend/main.mo.
Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
No external databases or cloud services; all data is stored in the canister.
No real-time features (WebSockets); couple collaboration is synchronous via canister queries/updates.
nonGoals: Full Journaling Section — Daily, Emotional, Night Reflection, Growth journals (Phase 2)

required: Soft abstract watercolor texture in warm cream and dusty rose tones, suitable as a full-page background (bg-texture.dim_1920x1080.png)
Minimal decorative illustration of intertwined hearts and a small calendar, warm line-art style on transparent background (couple-icon.dim_256x256.png)
Decorative quote mark illustration in warm amber, ornamental style on transparent background (quote-mark.dim_128x128.png)
